thread.section_title: Spotahome opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Spotahome | www.spotahome.com | 3 de 22
thread.title: JuPi

author: JuPi
title: JuPi
text:
The service of the Spotahome-Crew is awesome! As soon as you want to book a room or an apartement you receive a confirmation email and fro that time on the service person helps you with any kinds of questions - even on the weekend!
With my booking some things were unclear because the landlord first didnt want to accept it as it was too late for him, then i found another room and wanted to book it but the landlord from the first one then decided to accept my booking - Of course that had nothing to do with the Spotahome service staff. They were super friendly and helpfull!
